info.name: MATU's Dark Gitter
info.description: A derivative of @andrewjcole's dark gitter theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/112545/dark-gitter
info.additionalInfo:
>>>> You MUST refresh your gitter page for the custom scrollbars to show up! <<<<

Fixed several issues with @andrewjcole's theme, and added some other things.

Made for the OpenSprites team.
